hero.heading: Hi, I'm Muhammad Ghufran, a passionate Software Engineer crafting innovative digital solutions.
hero.name: Muhammad Ghufran
hero.title: Frontend Developer
hero.description: a passionate Software Engineer crafting innovative digital solutions
hero.contentBiography: A passionate Software Engineer and Informatics graduate who loves turning ideas into reality through code. When I'm not building applications, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, and collaborating with teams to solve complex problems.
hero.descWhatIDo: I specialize in creating modern web applications using React, TypeScript, and other cutting-edge technologies. With a passion for clean code and user-centered design, I build responsive, interactive experiences that solve real-world problems. Currently working as a Software Engineer while finishing my Informatics degree, I bring both academic knowledge and practical industry experience to every project.
hero.jobDes1: Creating responsive, interactive websites and web applications with modern frontend frameworks and best practices.
hero.jobDes2: Building robust server-side applications and APIs using modern backend technologies and best practices

ProjectSection.headline: Featured Projects
ProjectSection.description: Real-world projects showcasing backend development, system architecture, and problem-solving skills

projects.title: SIPEMA - Public Complaint System
projects.description: Public complaint management system for USK using Hono framework with TypeScript. Features RESTful APIs, PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM, user authentication, complaint tracking, and notification system.

projects.title: SIPEDAS - Employee Information System
projects.description: Employee management system for Aceh Social Service Department built with Express.js and Node.js. Features MongoDB database, role-based access control, approval workflow, and data validation.

projects.title: Fintrack - Financial App for SMEs
projects.description: Financial management application for SMEs with machine learning integration for expense categorization, financial forecasting, data visualization, and comprehensive financial tracking.

SkillSection.title: Tech Stack
SkillSection.description: Technologies and tools I've worked with and have experience using in various projects

aboutSection.title: About Me
aboutSection.biographyContent1: I'm a graduated Informatics professional with extensive hands-on experience in software development. During my 2-month internship at Aceh Provincial Social Service Department (Dinsos Prov Aceh), I specialized in backend development, building robust systems and APIs. I also completed a 6-month intensive program at Bangkit Academy as a Mobile Developer, where I honed my skills in mobile application development.
aboutSection.biographyContent2: I specialize in both frontend and backend development, combining technical expertise with design sensibility to build comprehensive web solutions. My approach blends beauty with functionality, focusing on responsive designs and robust REST APIs that work flawlessly across all devices. I'm constantly learning new technologies and methodologies to stay at the cutting edge of full-stack web development.
aboutSection.name: Muhammad Ghufran
aboutSection.universityDescription: Studying informatics with focus on software engineering, algorithms, and system design. Active in campus tech communities.
aboutSection.bangkitDescription: Developed Android apps using Kotlin with focus on performance and UX. Built Fintrack capstone project - financial app with ML integration. Enhanced problem-solving skills through real-world mobile development.
aboutSection.freelanceDescription: Developed comprehensive software solutions for various clients, focusing on scalable architecture, clean code, and optimal user experience.

skills.title: What I do
skills.description: I specialize in creating modern web applications using React, TypeScript, and other cutting-edge technologies. With a passion for clean code and user-centered design, I build responsive, interactive experiences that solve real-world problems. Currently working as a Software Engineer while finishing my Informatics degree, I bring both academic knowledge and practical industry experience to every project.
skills.frontendDesc: Building responsive and interactive user interfaces using React, TypeScript, and modern CSS frameworks
skills.backendDesc: Building robust server-side applications and APIs using modern backend technologies and best practices
